name: l'Innamorato
description:
L’Innamorato is a card based puzzle game. It was designed to be simple enough that anyone with a deck of cards could create puzzles and play at home.

Get the token from the Jack to the Queen, use the cards from your hand to create paths, and place face down cards that allow transitioning between suits when the sum of the cards equals 11.

Includes multiple deck styles to better suit your preferences.

Created for the EGX & Rock Paper Shotgun game jam 2018
